TopicTitle: Laythecat is bestcat. (Chobit's house of madness) The one thread to rule them all!

Articles.Content: Facebook stinks. Nuff' said.
Huh, agreed.
Aye, I only use it for it's IM feature since a lot of my friends don't use Skype
I rise in defense of the website! I <3 FB. Kept me in touch with my family and friends, and it's how my current relationship started. Wanna talk sucky? Google+. That's sucky!

Wanna talk sucky? Google+. That's sucky!

That, we can agree on.

Twitters worse. It's confusing, and the 140-character limit makes me want to slice my wrists while tearing my neck open. Reddish....

I only go on FB sometimes, but then agian, you have all these deadbeats posting stuff like "Z0MG, Imma kill ya if you don't post this 999999999999 time". Really man? Shaddaup, I don't care about Todd or whoever got killed by some random demon.

IDK what network is the best one for me.

All the good ones that weren't crawling with idiots are now dead because idiots flocked to the popular ones and those are the ones that companies fund.

When I want social interaction with people that aren't dumb jarhead wannabes, I come here (Well, not this thread specifically)

All the good ones that weren't crawling with idiots are now dead because idiots flocked to the popular ones and those are the ones that companies fund.

When I want social interaction with people that aren't dumb jarhead wannabes, I come here (Well, not this thread specifically)

Are you sure a thread that is run be me?

I find it funny how the minute business interests began moving into facebook in earnest, regular users started moving out.

And Google is evil. They already admitted to this, they control most of the world's information now and have evil plots in the works to make money with it.

Except everything they can think of they either already do or somebody else does better.

Hey Odin

http://xkcd.com/792/, its relevant

Hey Odin

http://xkcd.com/792/, its relevant

I was referring to that in my post.

Also, what he says about the reused passwords thing is completely true.

I was referring to that in my post.

Also, what he says about the reused passwords thing is completely true.

you know it, i am better than most in that I have 7 pass words that i pick from at random... but still if you know those seven well then
I always pick my passwords from Norse myth, because NOBODY can spell most of them

I actually determine mine using an algorithm that combines at least three different factors related to how it is used.

That way I don't actually forget them- if by chance I don't know it off the top of my head I can determine what it was.

I always pick my passwords from Norse myth, because NOBODY can spell most of them

And now everyone is going to attempt to log onto your account, chobit.
oh please. I use friendster. until now.
hey chobit i can spell MOST of them... I love Mythology

And now everyone is going to attempt to log onto your account, chobit.

Oh, by the way, don't forget to translate everything into perfect Finnish
ummm okay let me learn finnish.... NO
Password conversation now... wow, this thread goes everywhere...

Password conversation now... wow, this thread goes everywhere...

what is your password? mine is *************

Up to episode 4 now of Space Battleship Yamato.

I like what I see so far, other than the usual technical details regarding how a few of the mechanisms work.

Condensers should have temperature trips on them to raise an alarm long before they start melting.

what is your password? mine is *************

I laughed.

Is it bad that I don't know my password for this account? It's one of two, but I'm not sure which one I used. Chobit knows, though, thanks to the Incident-That-Shall-Not-Be-Mentioned.

I'll name it, NAZIS! WW2 HAPPENED FOLKS!!!! DEAL WITH IT!!!!!!!

*flails around in Wehrmacht battle-dress*

Oh that is incredibly slick Chobit.

Your Laythe defense system described earlier in this thread?

An identical system designed for a different purpose is described in episodes 4 and 5.

I see what you did there. And now I am sure I can beat that.
